content: {"name": "HELPING HANDS FOOD PANTRY @ BETHEL BAPTIST CHURCH", "alternate_name": "", "description": "SERVES KANNAPOLIS\nFIRST COME, FIRST SERVE CAN VISIT ONE TIME EACH MONTH", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1209 Opal Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Kannapolis", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28083", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.4722867, "longitude": -80.6036795}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 933-6600", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Food pantry: Needs to fill out a form"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
